message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I think you'll find it's still a great deal.
